article.title: BAE to Provide Precision Kill Weapon Guidance Section
article.text: BAE Systems Information and Electronics, Nashua, N.H., is being awarded a $37,443,252 firm-fixed-price contract to procure 1,372 Advanced Precision Kill Weapon Systems (APKWS) II WGU-59/B Guidance Section, the Navy shipping and storage container; and supporting programmatic documentation for the APKWS II WGU-59/B Guidance Sections. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity (N00019-14-C-0044).
